mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COMIC_PRODUCTSTOCK VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(PRODUCT_NUM),0)+1 FROM COMIC_PRODUCTSTOCK),#{product_name},#{product_price},#{product_qty},#{product_category})
mapper.update: UPDATE COMIC_PRODUCTSTOCK SET PRODUCT_NUM=#{product_num}-1 WHERE PRODUCT_NUM=#{product_num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from COMIC_PRODUCTSTOCK where product_num > #{product_num}
